entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 09:27 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 09:27 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
